summary: online version of this article (10.1186/s13099-018-0279-0) contains electronic supplementary material. additional files 13099_2018_279_MOESM1_ESM.xlsx (48.9KB, xlsx) Additional file 1: Table S1. table shows a categorized view of all the AMR genes predicted across 634 Salmonella ser. Heidelberg genomes. sample names are given in first row.
